abstracts.abstract: Nominates Danny Silverthorn as a Member of the State Employees Retirement System Board of Trustees.

actions.description: ** Appointment Message Carried Over from Previous General Assembly **
Received by the Senate Sen. Laura M. Murphy;  on 04/10/2024
Assigned to Executive Appointments;  on 04/10/2024 - and on 01/07/2025, Due to Sine Die of the 103rd General Assembly
Placed on Calendar Order of Executive Appointments

Pursuant to Senate Rule 10-1(c), move to compile the following AM's; AMs 1030439, 1030443, (Abraham Lincoln Presidential Library and Museum Board of Trustees)
AMs 1030440, 1030461, 1030472, (Energy Workforce Advisory Council)
AM 1030441 (Illinois Sports Facilities Authority)
AMs 1030473, 1030478 (Illinois Committee for Agricultural Education)
AMs 1030449, 1030450, 1030458 (Illinois State Museum Board)
AMs 1030453, 1030457, 1030465, 1030479 (Commission on Discrimination and Hate Crimes)
AM 1030454 (Southwestern Illinois Development Authority)
AMs 1030455, 1030456, 1030471, (Children and Family Services Advisory Council
AM 1030463 (State Employees Retirement System Board of Trustees)
AM 1030467 (Illinois Student Assistance Commission)
AM 1030468 (Public Administrator and Public Guardian of Ford County)
AM 1030469 (Public Administrator and Public Guardian of Livingston County)
AMs 1030474, 1030475 (Torture Inquiry and Relief Commission)
Motion Filed Appointment Messages Be Acted on Together ** Sen. Laura M. Murphy
